definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cast, shoot (As. ramû throw, lay; Ar. ramay throw, shoot; Eth. ramaya: strike, aim a blow at; Aram. [[רְמָא]], rmo0 cast, throw);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[ר]]:, subj. ´[[י]]: Ex 15:1, Ex 15:21 (song), c.acc. + [[בַּיׇּם]]; Pt. [[רׂמֵה קֶשֶׁת]] Je 4:29 coll. (or read [[רׂמֵי]] bow-shooter, bowmen, pl. cstr. ´[[נוֹשְׁקֵי רוֹמֵי־ק]]: Ps 78:9 (v. II. [[נשׁק]]); cf. [[רׂבֵה]] Ge 21:20 (v. II. [[רבה]], [[קַשָּׁת]]
